member_organisations:
Fund EcoMarket's current fund manager sponsors can be viewed on www.FundEcoMarket.co.uk.  (Logos are displayed on the home page). 
 
sriServices partners can be found via www.sriServices.co.uk
fields_of_interest: Environment, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Our area of interest is Sustainable finance, specifically in the UK retail investment (PRIIPS) market.  This includes all areas or ethical, ESG and impact investment.
goals__remit:
To support and encourage the growth of retail sustainable, responsible and ethical investment in the UK. 
 
Activities include specialist consultancy and the provision of free to use, fund manager supported, online SRI fund information  through our website  (an SRI fund information tool) www.FundEcoMarket.co.uk .
relevant_communication: Responding to relevant consultations, where possible, to improve the integration of sustainability and related issues into (mainly retail) financial services and investment markets.
